name: mymind
title: mymind
description: Manage and add your thoughts to my mind
author: arian

commands.name: add-a-new-note
commands.title: Add a New Note
commands.subtitle: mymind
commands.description: Adds a new note to mymind

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

preferences.name: jwt
preferences.title: JWT Token
preferences.description: Your MyMind JWT token value. Go to https://arian.gg/blog/setup for instructions.

preferences.title: CID
preferences.description: Your MyMind CID value. Go to https://arian.gg/blog/setup for instructions.

preferences.name: authenticityToken
preferences.title: Authenticity Token
preferences.description: Your MyMind Authenticity Token value. Go to https://arian.gg/blog/setup for instructions.
